channel.title: Comments on: Nagiosgraph is not updating

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I'm not 100% sure but most likely I should take back my words - the reason that nagiosgraph didn't get updated was because of embedded Perl problem mentioned <a href="http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/nagiosgraph/index.php?title=Main_Page#Embedded_PERL_.28ePN.29_returns_errors.__What_is_wrong.3F" rel="nofollow">here</a> or <a href="http://sourceforge.net/p/nagiosgraph/discussion/394748/thread/68879070" rel="nofollow">here</a>, the solution is change command definition (usually objects/commands.cfg) from /usr/libexec/nagiosgraph/insert.pl to /usr/bin/perl /usr/libexec/nagiosgraph/insert.pl.
At least it works for now.
item.content:encoded:
I’m not 100% sure but most likely I should take back my words – the reason that nagiosgraph didn’t get updated was because of embedded Perl problem mentioned here or here, the solution is change command definition (usually objects/commands.cfg) from /usr/libexec/nagiosgraph/insert.pl to /usr/bin/perl /usr/libexec/nagiosgraph/insert.pl.

At least it works for now.
